channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 2nd Gen AMD EPYC™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 2nd Gen AMD EPYC™

item.title: CVE-2021-26338|2024-08-03T20:26:23.933Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Improper access controls in System Management Unit (SMU) may allow for an attacker to override performance control tables located in DRAM resulting in a potential lack of system resources.

item.title: CVE-2021-26379|2024-08-03T20:26:25.077Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Insufficient input validation of mailbox data in the SMU may allow an attacker to coerce the SMU to corrupt SMRAM, potentially leading to a loss of integrity and privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2021-26370|2024-08-03T20:26:24.820Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Improper validation of destination address in SVC_LOAD_FW_IMAGE_BY_INSTANCE and SVC_LOAD_BINARY_BY_ATTRIB in a malicious UApp or ABL may allow an attacker to overwrite arbitrary bootloader memory with SPI ROM contents resulting in a loss of integrity and availability.
